title: Vintage Stamp
description: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique des tampons en caoutchouc, des linogravures ou des illustrations de boîtes d'allumettes du milieu du siècle, caractérisée par une palette duotone limitée et une application d'encre inégale et texturée. Il présente des formes graphiques audacieuses, des détails en espace négatif et une finition granuleuse sur un papier chaud et vieilli.
description_en: This style replicates the aesthetic of mid-century rubber stamps, linocuts, or matchbox art, characterized by a limited duotone palette and uneven, textured ink application. It features bold graphic shapes, negative space detailing, and a coarse, grainy finish on warm, aged paper.
description_fr: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique des tampons en caoutchouc, des linogravures ou des illustrations de boîtes d'allumettes du milieu du siècle, caractérisée par une palette duotone limitée et une application d'encre inégale et texturée. Il présente des formes graphiques audacieuses, des détails en espace négatif et une finition granuleuse sur un papier chaud et vieilli.
prompt: A vintage linocut and rubber stamp style illustration of {{subject}}. The artwork mimics the distinct look of mid-century matchbox label art or folk block printing. The image utilizes a strict two-tone ink palette on a warm, off-white cream paper background. The {{subject}} is rendered primarily in heavy, textured {{primary_color}} ink, defining the main volume and silhouette. Secondary details, ground elements, or atmospheric accents are stamped in a contrasting {{accent_color}} ink. The rendering technique features visible stippling, 'salt and pepper' noise, and uneven ink distribution, simulating the imperfections of a physical hand-pressed stamp. Details are carved out using negative space (the cream paper color) rather than drawn lines. There are no smooth gradients; shading is achieved through hatching or grain density. The edges of the forms are slightly eroded and rough. The overall atmosphere is rustic, nostalgic, and handcrafted, with a tactile paper texture visible throughout the composition. Reinforcement tags: woodblock print, risograph, screen print, coarse grain, ink bleed, eroded edges, flat colors, high contrast, folk art, 1950s design, analog texture, tactile finish, matte, retro aesthetic, minimalist composition.
background_prompt: A decorative background texture and environment in the style of a vintage block print or rubber stamp. The scene consists of rustic patterns, foliage, or abstract landscape elements rendered in rough {{accent_color}} ink on a warm cream paper texture. Patches of weathered {{primary_color}} ink stippling provide depth and contrast. The texture features heavy grain, ink erosion, and uneven stamping pressure, creating a nostalgic and handcrafted border or backdrop without a central figure.
prompt_removebg: A highly detailed vintage illustration of {{subject}} executed in the style of a classic woodblock print, copperplate engraving, or Toile de Jouy pattern. The artwork utilizes a strict duotone color scheme, with the {{subject}} rendered primarily in deep {{primary_color}} ink, while supporting environmental details, ground textures, or secondary elements are depicted in {{accent_color}}. The artistic technique relies heavily on stippling, dot work, and fine cross-hatching to define volume and texture, completely avoiding smooth gradients or modern digital shading. The lines are slightly rough, organic, and grainy, mimicking the imperfections of traditional analog ink printing on coarse paper. The visual atmosphere is nostalgic, rustic, and elegant, reminiscent of 19th-century storybook illustrations or antique lithographs. The image is composited centrally on a flat, clean {{background_color}} background to maximize contrast and ensure easy separation. The edges of the ink work show slight bleed and distressed texture. Key visual characteristics include etched lines, rough paper grain, and a screen-print aesthetic. Reinforcement tags: copperplate engraving, retro print, stipple art, high contrast, monochromatic variation, ink texture, historical illustration, vector-ready, clean composition, artistic sketching, rough paper grain, detailed line work, no blur, sharp ink edges.
background_prompt_removebg: A decorative vintage landscape or pattern featuring pastoral elements, stylized etched foliage, and rough terrain textures rendered in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. The design mimics the hatched and stippled look of antique engravings or Toile de Jouy fabrics. The scene is set against a {{background_color}} surface, providing a textured, nostalgic atmosphere with visible paper grain and ink imperfections, devoid of any central character.
